author: Linda Givetash and Yuliya Talmazan and Sally Bronston and Dartunorro Clark and Leou Chen
title: U.S. sees deadliest day in COVID-19 outbreak
description: As the Chinese city that was the original center of the coronavirus outbreak came out of lockdown, the U.S. saw its deadliest day yet.
content:
As the Chinese city that was the original center of the coronavirus outbreak came out of lockdown with a celebratory light show, the U.S. registered its deadliest day yet with nearly 2,000 lives lost.
After 11 weeks of strict restrictions on their movements,… [+3358 chars]
